subject:
Re: [cc-community] Wikitravel wins Webby Award for Best Travel
	Website
body:
Good to see my vote wasn't in vain :)

Congrats!

grtz
BjornW


Evan Prodromou wrote:
> On Tue, 2007-10-04 at 12:53 -0400, Evan Prodromou wrote:
>> Hi, everyone. I wanted to point out that Wikitravel has been nominated
>> for a Webby Award in the Travel Category
> 
> I wanted to follow up on this to let people know that the Webby winners
> were announced today, and Wikitravel won for Best Travel Website.
> 
> Thanks to all for your support.
> 
> -Evan
>
